title: Zaza Pachulia - Wikipedia
snippet: On August 29, 2019, Pachulia retired from playing and re-joined the Warriors as a front office consultant in their basketball operations department. He won his third NBA championship after the Warriors defeated the Boston Celtics in six games in the 2022 NBA Finals.

title: Zaza Pachulia Retires, Joins Warriors As Consultant – SLAM
snippet: After a one-year stint with the Detroit Pistons, Zaza Pachulia is returning to the Golden State Warriors, the team announced. This time, however, Pachulia won’t serve as a player but as a team consultant.

title: Pachulia rejoins Warriors as consultant following retirement | theScore.com
snippet: Veteran center Zaza Pachulia has retired after a 16-year NBA career and is rejoining the Golden State Warriors as a consultant.Pachulia was a frequent starter during his two seasons in the Bay Area and helped the franchise win back-to-back ...
